configuration:
ozone.om.address om
ozone.om.http-address om:9874
ozone.scm.http-address scm:9876
ozone.scm.container.size 1GB
ozone.scm.block.size 1MB
ozone.scm.datanode.ratis.volume.free-space.min 10MB
ozone.scm.pipeline.creation.interval 30s
ozone.scm.pipeline.owner.container.count 1
ozone.scm.names scm
ozone.scm.datanode.id.dir /data
ozone.scm.block.client.address scm
ozone.metadata.dirs /data/metadata
ozone.recon.db.dir /data/metadata/recon
ozone.scm.client.address scm
hdds.datanode.dir /data/hdds
ozone.recon.address recon:9891
ozone.recon.heatmap.provider org.apache.hadoop.ozone.recon.heatmap.HeatMapProviderImpl
ozone.recon.http-address 0.0.0.0:9888
ozone.recon.https-address 0.0.0.0:9889
ozone.recon.om.snapshot.task.interval.delay 1m
ozone.datanode.pipeline.limit 1
hdds.scmclient.max.retry.timeout 30s
hdds.container.report.interval 60s
ozone.scm.stale.node.interval 30s
ozone.scm.dead.node.interval 45s
hdds.heartbeat.interval 5s
ozone.scm.close.container.wait.duration 5s
dfs.container.ratis.datastream.enabled true
# Explicitly enable filesystem snapshot feature for this Docker compose cluster
ozone.filesystem.snapshot.enabled true
